data.comment: We are now ready for the penalty shootout!
In the minute 0, Johnny Russell (Kansas City) scores!
A devastated Oswaldo Alanis (San Jose) misses and walks back to his team mates.
Ilie Sanchez (Kansas City) scores from the penalty spot.
In the minute 0, Jackson Yueill (San Jose) misses his penalty attempt!
Khiry Shelton (Kansas City) converts his penalty!
Cristian Espinoza (San Jose) misses!
In the minute 0, The penalty shootout is over. The final score is 3-0.
The match has started.
Can San Jose get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kansas City's half?
In the minute 4, Corner awarded to Kansas City.
Goal! Kansas City have taken a 1-0 lead courtesy of a header from Roger Espinoza.
Johnny Russell with an assist there.
In the minute 6, Throw-in for Kansas City close to the penalty box.
Kansas City pushes forward through Gerso Fernandes, whose finish on goal is saved.
San Jose awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 9, Throw-in Kansas City.
Kansas City's Gerso Fernandes is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick for San Jose in their own half.
In the minute 11, Nima Saghafi signals a throw-in for Kansas City, close to San Jose's area.
San Jose awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Nima Saghafi awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 13, Free kick San Jose.
Throw-in for San Jose in their own half.
Nima Saghafi signals a free kick to Kansas City.
In the minute 17, Nima Saghafi signals a free kick to San Jose in their own half.
Ball safe as Kansas City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Nima Saghafi signals a free kick to Kansas City in their own half.
In the minute 21, San Jose have a dangerous throw-in.
Carlos Fierro (San Jose) levels the match at 1-1 with a header.
San Jose have been awarded a corner by Nima Saghafi.
In the minute 25, San Jose awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Kansas City a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for San Jose in their own half.
In the minute 28, Free kick for Kansas City in the half of San Jose.
Nick Lima (San Jose) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kansas City.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for San Jose at Children's Mercy Park.
Ball safe as San Jose is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kansas City to take a throw-in in San Jose territory.
In the minute 34, Goal! Shea Salinas gives San Jose a 1-2 lead.
Cristian Espinoza instrumental with a fine assist.
Nima Saghafi awards San Jose a goal kick.
In the minute 37, Goal kick for Kansas City at Children's Mercy Park.
Throw-in for San Jose at Children's Mercy Park.
Throw-in for Kansas City in their own half.
In the minute 39, Nima Saghafi signals a free kick to San Jose in their own half.
Winston Reid (Kansas City) gets a yellow card.
Kansas City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 41, Nima Saghafi signals a free kick to San Jose.
Nima Saghafi signals a free kick to San Jose just outside Kansas City's area.
San Jose's Nick Lima breaks free at Children's Mercy Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 43, Kansas City have a goal kick.
Throw-in Kansas City.
Nima Saghafi awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Kansas City in the half of San Jose.
In Kansas City Kansas City drive forward through Gianluca Busio. His shot is on target but it's saved.
The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can San Jose capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kansas City's half?
Throw-in for Kansas City in their own half.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Kansas City in their own half.
San Jose awarded a free kick in their own half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
Nima Saghafi signals a Kansas City throw-in in San Jose's half.
San Jose needs to be cautious. Kansas City have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 47, Corner awarded to Kansas City.
Ilie Sanchez levels the score at 2-2.
That's a fine assist from Gianluca Busio.
In the minute 50, Roger Espinoza of Kansas City smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Ball goes out of play for a Kansas City goal kick.
San Jose have been awarded a corner by Nima Saghafi.
In the minute 53, San Jose have been awarded a corner by Nima Saghafi.
Important block from the San Jose defence as Gerso Fernandes fires in a strike for Kansas City.
Goal kick for Kansas City at Children's Mercy Park.
In the minute 54, Nima Saghafi awards Kansas City a goal kick.
Corner awarded to San Jose.
Ball goes out of play for a Kansas City goal kick.
In the minute 56, In Kansas City a free kick has been awarded the home team.
At Children's Mercy Park, Marcos Lopez has been yellow-carded for the away team.
San Jose have a goal kick.
In the minute 58, Nima Saghafi awards the away team a throw-in.
San Jose have been awarded a corner by Nima Saghafi.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kansas City.
In the minute 61, Corner awarded to Kansas City.
Kansas City surge into the attack at Children's Mercy Park but Winston Reid’s header is off-target.
Goal kick for San Jose at Children's Mercy Park.
In the minute 62, Kansas City awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for San Jose in Kansas City.
Nima Saghafi signals a free kick to Kansas City in their own half.
In the minute 65, Throw-in for San Jose at Children's Mercy Park.
Throw-in San Jose.
San Jose's Chris Wondolowski breaks free at Children's Mercy Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 66, Ball goes out of play for a Kansas City goal kick.
San Jose awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for Kansas City!
In the minute 71, Johnny Russell of Kansas City gets in a strike, but is off target.
San Jose have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kansas City.
In the minute 72, Nima Saghafi signals a San Jose throw-in in Kansas City's half.
Free kick for San Jose in the half of Kansas City.
Free kick Kansas City.
In the minute 74, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Gerso Fernandes.
Free kick for San Jose in their own half.
Free kick for Kansas City in their own half.
In the minute 76, Kansas City's Gerso Fernandes looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Ball safe as Kansas City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for San Jose in the half of Kansas City.
In the minute 78, Nima Saghafi signals a free kick to San Jose in their own half.
Amadou Dia (Kansas City) has received a yellow card from Nima Saghafi.
San Jose awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 79, Roger Espinoza (Kansas City) has received a first yellow card.
Free kick San Jose.
Ball safe as Kansas City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 82, San Jose awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Kansas City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in San Jose's half?
In the minute 84, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Nima Saghafi signals a free kick to Kansas City.
San Jose's Cristian Espinoza has been booked in Kansas City.
Free kick for San Jose in the half of Kansas City.
Nima Saghafi awards Kansas City a goal kick.
In the minute 86, Johnny Russell is booked for the home team.
Nima Saghafi awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 87, Cade Cowell is replacing Shea Salinas for the away team.
The away team have replaced Carlos Fierro with Andy Rios. This is the second substitution made today by Matias Jesus Almeyda.
San Jose to take a throw-in in Kansas City territory.
In the minute 89, Corner awarded to San Jose.
Very nearly a goal for San Jose as Chris Wondolowskistrikes the woodwork with a header.
Goal kick for Kansas City at Children's Mercy Park.
Kansas City awarded a free kick in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Kansas City at Children's Mercy Park.
Throw-in Kansas City.
Can Kansas City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in San Jose's half?
Nima Saghafi signals a free kick to San Jose in their own half.
Nima Saghafi awards Kansas City a goal kick.
Throw-in for San Jose in their own half.
It's 3-3 at the end of normal time.
Goal! The home team take a 3-2 lead through Gianluca Busio.
Great play from Khiry Shelton to set up the goal.
The home team replace Roger Espinoza with Felipe Hernandez.
Peter Vermes (Kansas City) is making a second substitution, with Erik Hurtado replacing Gerso Fernandes.
Chris Wondolowski equalizes with a header to make it 3-3.
Great play from Cristian Espinoza to set up the goal.
The first extra period is just kicking-off.
Throw-in for San Jose in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Nima Saghafi signals a San Jose throw-in in Kansas City's half.
Kansas City are in shooting range from this free kick.
Kansas City have been awarded a corner by Nima Saghafi.
Gadi Kinda is on a sub for Gianluca Busio for Kansas City.
Cristian Espinoza of San Jose gets in a strike, but is off target.
Kansas City have a goal kick.
Throw-in San Jose.
Tommy Thompson is replacing Marcos Lopez for San Jose at Children's Mercy Park.
In Kansas City a free kick has been awarded the home team.
San Jose needs to be cautious. Kansas City have an attacking throw-in.
Ball safe as San Jose is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The second extra period is just kicking-off.
Kansas City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Kansas City in the half of San Jose.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kansas City.
Ball goes out of play for a San Jose goal kick.
Nima Saghafi awards the home team a throw-in.
Kansas City's Erik Hurtado gets in a shot but it is blocked by a San Jose defender.
Can Kansas City capitalize from this throw-in deep inside San Jose's half?
Cade Cowell gets his shot on target but fails to score for San Jose.
San Jose to take a throw-in in Kansas City territory.
Matias Jesus Almeyda is making the team's fourth substitution at Children's Mercy Park with Eric Calvillo replacing Judson.
Nima Saghafi signals a Kansas City throw-in in San Jose's half.
Nima Saghafi awards San Jose a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Kansas City.
Can San Jose get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kansas City's half?
Throw-in for San Jose at Children's Mercy Park.
Free kick for Kansas City in their own half.
Extra-time is over. The score is 3-3.
